dialogue.speaker: Lul첫
text: ...Pippi?
you came all this way down here?
you shouldn't have. i could've handled this myself.

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: i don't doubt it at all.
i just missed you, i wanted to see you.

dialogue.speaker: Lul첫
text: why do you do all this for me? what are you trying to gain?
you're missing out on a lot

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: i'm not trying to achieve anything
to this day, i've never seen anyone more beautiful than you
i feel my heart jump inside of my chest when you look at me
you don't know i happy it makes me whenever you get closer to me
every time you compliment me i love myself more
i don't care what i'm missing

dialogue.speaker: Lul첫
text: i don't know what to say.
you're so stubborn. . .
thanks for these words, pippi
just remember that i care for you
you need to relax, and take it easier
you'll only hurt yourself by stressing yourself for no reason
don't ever think i'm going away

dialogue.speaker: Pippi
text: thank you for everything
you're the most important person i know
i won't go anywhere either

dialogue.speaker: Lul첫
text: come on now
let's get out of here before this dungeon falls apart.
